course_description: The purpose of this course is to to give the students experience teaching bioethics in an environment where they can expect attentive mentoring by faculty who are experienced with both the clinical and academic sides of the field.
prerequisites: BIOETH 501 and BIOETH 502 and BIOETH 503 and BIOETH 601 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2242, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: G. Vong, Status: Open
